## Chocolate muffins `r freezes` `r vegan`

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="80%"}

200g P flour \
2tsp BP \
pinch salt \
40g cocoa \
100g brown sugar \
50ml oil \
200ml water \
vanilla \
100g chocolate chips

:::

::: {.column width="20%"}

180° \
20mins \
9 muffins

:::

::::

*Method*

1. Sieve dry twice, then muffin method.
